title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier.
2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin exporting to zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up with the following detail: 'Problems were encountered during export', listing the file of the same name in project2 as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name but under different directories without encountering any problems.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create two projects with files having the same name but in different directories.
2. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
3. Select both projects.
4. Provide a name for the zip file.
5. Click on 'Export' to begin the export process.
